name: Brush Rush (Jami_Vankka)
description:
If the game doesn't show properly play the game Here.

If the gameplay video doesn't show see it Here.

Brush Rush is an adventure platformer game where the world is your canvas. Defeat your enemies with colorful attacks, think with colors and watch your step.

Programming:

Jami Vankka, Mikael Joensuu, Juuso Patjas

Music and sound:

Miska Lahtinen

Art and animation:

Janina Sonné
